entry.tran: 勉强维持生活;生存;存活
entry.def: Subsistence is the condition of just having enough food or money to stay alive.

example.ex: The standard of living today is on the edge of subsistence.
example.tran: 现在的生活水平几乎快要无法维持生计。

entry.tran: (农业或农业生产)收成仅够自身口粮的
entry.def: In subsistence farming or subsistence agriculture, farmers produce food to eat themselves rather than to sell.

example.ex: Many black Namibians are subsistence farmers who live in the arid borderlands.
example.tran: 许多生活在土地贫瘠的边境地区的纳米比亚黑人农场主的收成仅够维持自身的口粮。

sentences.sentence: "social security provided only a bare subsistence"
"farming is a hard means of subsistence"

means.word_mean: 3. the state of existing in reality; having substance

stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的
persist[v.坚持]+ent表形容词→adj.固执的,坚持的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ent表形容词→adj.抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ible可..的→adj.可抵抗的
assist[v.帮助]+ant人→n.助手,助教;辅助物
consist[v.[in]在于,存在于;[of]由…组成,由…构成]+ence表名词→n.坚固性,浓度

stems_affixes.value_cn: 存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
stems_affixes.word_buile: exist[v.存在;生存;生活]+ence表名词→n.存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
insist[v.[on]坚持要求,坚决主张,坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持,强求
persist[v.坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持, 持续
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ance表名词→n.[to]抵抗,反抗;抵抗力,阻力;电阻
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ence表名词→n.抵抗力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生存, 生活, 留存
stems_affixes.word_buile: subsist[v.生存,存在,供养]+ence表名词→n.生存, 生活, 留存
as加强动作+sist站→站过来→帮助
con共同+sist站立→站到一起→帮助
de加强+sist站立→站着不动→停止
sub下面+sist站立→站下去,活下去

means.word_mean: 存活, 生存, 维生之道

sentences.en: He is on the margin of bare subsistence.
Their subsistence comes from the sea.
Their main mode of subsistence is hunting.
Most of the population lives at subsistence level.
sentences.cn: 大多数人过着勉强糊口的生活。

sentences.en: She had no means of subsistence and was dependent on charity.
sentences.cn: 她没什么谋生手段，只能依靠救济。

sentences.en: They were living barely above the level of subsistence.
sentences.cn: 他们的生活水平勉强在最低水平线以上。
